info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...CORTLAND... AND BROOME COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20-25 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. Blowing snow can also quickly reduce visibility. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 900 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was over Marathon moving southeast at 45 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Guilford, Coventry, Greene, Oxford, Bainbridge, Cincinnatus, McGraw, Willet, Whitney Point and Marathon. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 8 and 9. Interstate 88 between 5 and 8. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
